head.s: Harmonics in Voltage and Current Signals

p.s: The first 15 harmonics present in IAP ( Instantaneous Active Power ) are used for analysis for fault detection which was extracted using FFT ( Fast Fourier Transform ) .
The harmonic that shows the maximum separation between the healthy and faulty cases is used for analysis .
The machine is operated at the same operating conditions as it is operated for commanded voltages method .
